definition: to bubble/to foam/to blister/to sprout boils (on one's body)/sparkling (wine etc)

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
to emit bubbles/to bubble/to foam (with rage)/to seethe

sentences.english: Some Super Automatic Espresso Machines will even froth and dispense milk automatically.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些自动咖啡机甚至会自动起泡沫并分配牛奶。

sentences.english: Paint a bar of soap completely with clear nail polish so it won't suds up.
sentences.chinese: 在一条肥皂上涂满卸甲油，这样肥皂不再起泡。

sentences.english: The soap lathers up in an instant and gives off an expensive scent.
sentences.chinese: 这种肥皂会立即起泡并散发出高雅香味。

sentences.english: The Bubbler is a sure way to keep your carwash reclaim water smelling fresh and clean.
sentences.chinese: 起泡器可以保持您的清洗车辆的水质干净，清香。

sentences.english: Before washing the clothes, froth up the soap mixture.
sentences.chinese: 洗衣之前先把皂液搅起泡沫。

sentences.english: The ginger ale foamed over onto the table.
sentences.chinese: 姜汁汽水起泡沫满到桌上。

sentences.english: This soap lathers well and quickly.
sentences.chinese: 这肥皂起泡沫又多又快。

sentences.english: Chemical reaction do not take place in fizzing test tube.
sentences.chinese: 化学反应不会发生在起泡的试管里。

sentences.english: The same gas performs frothing of the molten metal before the latter is driven into the vacuum chamber.
sentences.chinese: 同时，该气体会让熔融金属在进入真空室之前起泡。

sentences.english: The agitated mixture foamed and bubbled.
sentences.chinese: 翻腾的混合物不断起泡沫。

sentences.english: Her feet blistered during the long hike.
sentences.chinese: 长途跋涉中她的脚起泡了。

sentences.english: Bubbles are engaging because of their effervescence.
sentences.chinese: 气泡因它的起泡而迷人。

sentences.english: Touching the hot iron made his finger blister.
sentences.chinese: 他的手指因碰到热烫斗而起泡。

sentences.english: When mixing or reconstituting protein solutions, always avoid foaming.
sentences.chinese: 当混合蛋白溶液时应尽量轻缓，避免起泡。

sentences.english: Necrosis of hepatocytes and cytoplasmic blebbing were also observed.
sentences.chinese: 坏死的肝细胞和细胞质的起泡是被观察到了。

sentences.english: So that how do frothily is crus ironed by autocycle vent-pipe?
sentences.chinese: 小腿被摩托车排气管烫得起泡怎么办啊？

definition: to emit bubbles/to bubble/to foam (with rage)/to seethe
(of dry soil, skin etc) to crack/to chap
to split open/to dehisce (of fruit or cotton bolls, to split open)
